step.tex: \begin{align} \dfrac{d}{dx}f\left(x\right) &= 4x^3 - \dfrac{3}{x^4}\\ \end{align}\\ \text{To find }f\left(x\right) \text{we need to integrate }\dfrac{d}{dx}f\left(x\right)\\ \begin{align} \int \dfrac{d}{dx}f\left(x\right)dx &= \int \left(4x^3 - \dfrac{3}{x^4}\right)dx\\ &=\int \left(4x^3 - 3x^{-4}\right)dx\\ &=\dfrac{4x^{3 + 1}}{\left(3+1\right)} - \dfrac{3 x^{-4+1}}{\left(-4+1\right)} +C\\ &=\dfrac{4x^{4}}{\left(4\right)} - 3 \dfrac{x^{-3}}{\left(-3\right)} +C\\ &=x^4 + \dfrac{1}{x^3}+C\\ \end{align}\\ \text{C is the constant of integration.}
